ComicInfo.Title: Crime From The Skies!; Dr. Insect and His Ant Men!; Agents Of BADGE
ComicInfo.Summary: Dragon finds himself at B.A.D.G.E. HQ in 1965, mistaken for a spy out to steal the "Infinity Orb". But before long, both he and The Badge find themselves pulled into the timestream.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Dan Preece,Daniel Reed,Chris Ecker,Dan Preece,Daniel Reed,Chris Ecker
ComicInfo.Inker: Dan Preece,Daniel Reed,Jim Brozman,Dan Preece,Daniel Reed,Jim Brozman
